SELECT dp.product_name productName,sum(ob.total_premium) totalPremium FROM f_order.order_base ob INNER JOIN f_order.dic_product dp ON ob.product_id = dp.product_id
AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY productName ORDER BY totalPremium DESC

SELECT dc.name source,sum(ob.total_premium) totalPremium FROM f_order.order_base ob INNER JOIN f_order.dic_channel dc ON ob.source = dc.id
AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY source ORDER BY totalPremium DESC

SELECT dp.product_name productName, SUM( CASE WHEN date(create_time) = date(CURDATE()-7) THEN ob.total_premium ELSE 0 END) totalPremium7, SUM( CASE WHEN date(create_time) = date(CURDATE()-6) THEN ob.total_premium ELSE 0 END) totalPremium6, SUM( CASE WHEN date(create_time) = date(CURDATE()-5) THEN ob.total_premium ELSE 0 END) totalPremium5, SUM( CASE WHEN date(create_time) = date(CURDATE()-4) THEN ob.total_premium ELSE 0 END) totalPremium4, SUM( CASE WHEN date(create_time) = date(CURDATE()-3) THEN ob.total_premium ELSE 0 END) totalPremium3, SUM( CASE WHEN date(create_time) = date(CURDATE()-2) THEN ob.total_premium ELSE 0 END) totalPremium2, SUM( CASE WHEN date(create_time) = date(CURDATE()-1) THEN ob.total_premium ELSE 0 END) totalPremium1 FROM f_order.order_base ob INNER JOIN f_order.dic_product dp ON ob.product_id = dp.product_id
AND ob.create_time >= concat(date(CURDATE()-7),' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(date(CURDATE()-1),' 23:59:59')
GROUP BY productName

SELECT IFNULL(dc.name ,ob.source) source,ob.order_id orderId,opi.name personName,IFNULL(dce.name ,opi.identify_type) certificateType,opi.identify_no certificateNo, CASE WHEN opi.sex = 'M' THEN '男' WHEN opi.sex = 'F' THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END sex,opi.age age,date(ob.create_time) orderDate, ob.start_date startDate,opi.mobile mobilePhone,opi.email email,ob.total_premium totalPremium, CASE WHEN ob.paid_flag IS NULL THEN '未支付' WHEN ob.paid_flag='1' THEN '支付成功' WHEN ob.paid_flag='0' THEN '支付失败' ELSE '未知状态' END payStatus, CURDATE() extractionDate FROM f_order.order_base ob INNER JOIN f_order.order_plc_ins opi ON ob.order_id = opi.order_id AND opi.insurer_flag='2'
AND ob.create_time >= concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00')
AND ob.create_time <= concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59')
LEFT JOIN f_order.dic_channel dc ON ob.source = dc.id LEFT JOIN f_order.dic_certificate dce ON opi.identify_type = dce.id GROUP BY orderId
